---
title: "`r paste(lubridate::year(as.Date(SDATE,'%m/%d/%Y')),'LAKE SUPERIOR CREEL SURVEY RESULTS')`"
params:
  FDATE:
    value: 09/30/2014
  FTYPE:
    value: SAS
  LOC:
    value: sup
  SDATE:
    value: 05/21/2014
  TABLES:
    value: !r c(1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9)
  WDIR:
    value: ""
  RDIR:
    value: ""
output:
  html_document:
    theme: sandstone
    css: tables.css
---

```{r input, echo=FALSE}
## Grab User's Inputs from parameters
LOC <- params$LOC
SDATE <- params$SDATE
FDATE <- params$FDATE
FTYPE <- params$FTYPE
TABLES <- params$TABLES
WDIR <- params$WDIR
RDIR <- params$RDIR
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
## Preliminaries
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

## Run the analysis
source(paste0(WDIR,"helpers/LSCreel_DataPrep.R"))
## Make table captions
tables <- tableCaptions()
```

## `r paste0(iMvLoc(LOC),", ",format(SDATE,format='%m/%d/%y')," - ",format(FDATE,format='%m/%d/%y'))`
#### Report run on `r format(lubridate::now(),format="%d-%b-%Y at %H:%M")`


```{r table1, eval=1 %in% TABLES, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
cat("<br><br>")
cat("<hr>")
cat(tables("Table1"))
table1(fnpre)
```
